messages.subject: RECENT UPDATES - Samurai Archives
messages.msgSnippet: Updates as of 10-23-00 samurai archives japanese history page www.techjapanese.com/samurai/ ... Japanese Date Converter version 1.01 is now ready for
messages.messageBody:
Updates as of 10-23-00
samurai archives japanese history page
www.techjapanese.com/samurai/
----------------------

'Japanese Date Converter' version 1.01 is now ready for download.
Enter any date from 645AD - 2000AD into the top textbox, and you
will be given the corresponding Japanese Period name and Era name and
Era number. Enter any era name and era number corresponding to
645AD - 2000AD into the bottom textbox, and you will be given the
corresponding 'western' year.
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/downloads.html

a new guest article, by Agustin J. Rogriguez, "Kawari Kabuto and the
Great Warlords of the "Sengoku"" has been added:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/KabArt.html

the 'battles' section has been updated with the battles of Arai,
Miki, Nagashima 1571, the Ã”tate no ran, Sakai 1399, and Uzu
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/battles.html

short bios and information on the Generals of Uesuigi Kenshin and
Takeda Shingen:
Kenshin: http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/uesugiret.html
Shingen: http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/takedaret.html

And don't forget to stop by the Samurai history forum on
Delphi.com - join in the conversation, feel free to post any
questions or comments related to japanese history:
http://www.delphi.com/samuraihistory/
